org.jamsim.ascape.r

Class PanelViewRTextCommand

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jamsim.ascape.r.PanelViewRTextCommand
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.ascape.runtime.swing.navigator.PanelViewProvider

    public class PanelViewRTextCommand
extends Object
implements org.ascape.runtime.swing.navigator.PanelViewProvider
    Executes an command in R each time getPanelView() is called. Provides a PanelView with the text results of the R command as it would have been output to the R console.
    Version:
    $Revision$
    Author:
    Oliver Mannion

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Font DEFAULT_FONT
      Default font for text area text : Monospaced plain 12 pt.

      PanelViewRTextCommand(ScapeRInterface scapeR, String nodeName, String rcmd, Font font)
      Create a PanelViewRTextCommand that will execute an R command and return the result in a PanelView.

      • PanelViewRTextCommand

        public PanelViewRTextCommand(ScapeRInterface scapeR,
                     String nodeName,
                     String rcmd,
                     Font font)
        Create a PanelViewRTextCommand that will execute an R command and return the result in a PanelView.
        Parameters:
        scapeR - scape R interface
        nodeName - name of node
        rcmd - R command to execute
        font - font to use in textarea that displays dataframe details. If null uses DEFAULT_FONT.
